ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.singletons

Class ListHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.singletons.ListHandler

  • public class ListHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class ListHandler. Singleton. Main access point of the various lists for each fragment. Also holds the user.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    group 10
